category.name: Integration.TCAA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TCAA84_mapping_remove_trailing_zeros
preference.preference_description: Through this option it is possible to specify whether traling zeros are to be removed when mapping a Teamcenter attribute of type "Double" to AutoCAD (string) attribute. Possible values: 0 - trailing zeros are preserved (Default) 1 - trailing zeros are removed
